announcement.author: Nick K
announcement.title: GameDevClub Meeting #2: Lets make a platformer in like 2 hours
announcement.body: Hey guys tomorrow is our quarterly beginner tutorial! We will be making a platformer like Super Mario Bros from scratch. Intermediate devs can try to make Super Mario 64. DOWNLOAD UNITY. BRING A MOUSE AND POWER STRIPS. CHAIRS WILL BE PROVIDED

announcement.author: Frank Han
announcement.title: First meeting
announcement.body: Our first meeting of the year is October 5th! Excited to meet everyone and showcase what our club is about! See you guys at Seig 311 at 4:30PM.
